name: Clockwork Dice
description:
Clockwork dice is a dice-placement game for 2 or more players. It's so simple that the entire set of rules can fit on something the size of a playing card, and can be slipped into your favorite deck. 

All that is required for each player is two 7-dice sets and the game itself. The sheet or card is even used as clocks for the game.

Included

  • The colored playing card version in .png and .pdf
  • The black and white playing card version in both .png and .pdf
  • The standard letter size version in .pdf.

So grab your two luckiest sets of dice and start rolling! Let's see who can finish their clock first!
